Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Western
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Damen, and Harrison, due to police activity near Harrison/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Damen, and Harrison, due to police activity near Harrison/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Fullerton. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Fullerton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a door problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a door problem on the train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
